DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal project establish pilot study develop refine intervention promote consumption fish low mercury high n-3 PUFA among pregnant woman . The investigator demonstrate ability recruit pregnant woman , influence fish consumption , measure change nutrient toxicant biomarkers .
DOC.criteria: age 18 year older Currently pregnant 1222 week Singleton pregnancy Consuming fish < =2 time per month Inability answer questionnaire English Plans leave study area prior delivery Would never eat fish ( e.g . vegan , allergy fish )
